this_title: Westlife - The Where We Are Tour Live From The O2
trans_title: 西城男孩 爱就在这里 2010伦敦演唱会
introduction: The Where We Are Tour is a tour by Irish pop band, Westlife in support of their ninth studio album, Where We Are. The band toured in numerous counties in the United Kingdom and Ireland, Faroe Islands, Scotland and Wales. The 14 May date of the tour, which took place on The O2 Arena, London, had a live broadcast on Sky Box Office.[8] It was also taped for a concert DVD, Where We Are Tour: Live from The O2, which was released on 29 November 2010. This was the third hottest tour of May 2010 according to Billboard.
chinese_title: 西城男孩 爱就在这里 2010伦敦演唱会
foreign_title: Westlife - The Where We Are Tour Live From The O2
